name: Fruitful
tag_list: digital-publishing, content-marketing, content-on-demand, syndicate, syndication, free-content, backlinks, backlink-juice
overview:
Fruitful is a digital publishing platform, syndicator and content provider. With access to 45,000 contributors Fruitful provides free keyword-based content, targeted content on demand and publication to multiple large scale syndicators. Fruitful also publishes content to its network of over 100,000 targeted websites, which have up to a PR4, to provide highly targeted and large distribution and powerful backlinks.

In one place, Fruitful solves two of the biggest problems facing online marketers; quality content and quality traffic for websites. Users can gain fast and lucrative results by having their content published on a gigantic network of websites and blogs and access to free content to publish on their own sites.

Fruitful is currently in closed beta.
